entry.title: SNOWFALL WARNING , Liard River
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 3:29 PM PST Sunday 12 February 2023

entry.title: Sunday night: Periods of snow. Low minus 9.
entry.summary: Periods of snow. Amount 5 cm. Wind southwest 20 km/h becoming light this evening. Low minus 9. Wind chill minus 5 this evening and minus 12 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM PST Sunday 12 February 2023

entry.title: Monday: Flurries. Temperature steady near minus 6.
entry.summary: Flurries. Local amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind up to 15 km/h. Temperature steady near minus 6. Wind chill minus 13 in the morning and minus 8 in the afternoon. Forecast issued 4:00 PM PST Sunday 12 February 2023

entry.title: Monday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 12. POP 60%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy with 60 percent chance of flurries. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 12. Wind chill minus 9 in the evening and minus 14 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM PST Sunday 12 February 2023

entry.title: Tuesday: A mix of sun and cloud. High minus 9.
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. High minus 9. Forecast issued 4:00 PM PST Sunday 12 February 2023

entry.title: Tuesday night: Cloudy. Low minus 18.
entry.summary: Increasing cloudiness. Low minus 18. Forecast issued 4:00 PM PST Sunday 12 February 2023

entry.title: Wednesday: Chance of flurries. High minus 4. POP 70%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 70 percent chance of flurries. High minus 4. Forecast issued 4:00 PM PST Sunday 12 February 2023

entry.title: Wednesday night: Cloudy periods. Low minus 14.
entry.summary: Cloudy periods. Low minus 14. Forecast issued 4:00 PM PST Sunday 12 February 2023

entry.title: Thursday: A mix of sun and cloud. High minus 8.
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. High minus 8. Forecast issued 4:00 PM PST Sunday 12 February 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 19. POP 60%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 60 percent chance of flurries. Low minus 19. Forecast issued 4:00 PM PST Sunday 12 February 2023

entry.title: Friday: A mix of sun and cloud. High minus 12.
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. High minus 12. Forecast issued 4:00 PM PST Sunday 12 February 2023

entry.title: Friday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 14. POP 60%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 60 percent chance of flurries. Low minus 14. Forecast issued 4:00 PM PST Sunday 12 February 2023

entry.title: Saturday: Chance of flurries. High minus 8. POP 60%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 60 percent chance of flurries. High minus 8. Forecast issued 4:00 PM PST Sunday 12 February 2023
